articles.title: Apple updates AirPods Max headphones with a USB-C port and new colors - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple released a new version of its premium over-the-ear headphones, AirPods Max, on Monday during its 2024 Apple Event. The revamp replaces the AirPods
articles.content: Apple released a new version of its premium over-the-ear headphones, AirPods Max, on Monday during its 2024 Apple Event. The revamp replaces the AirPods Max’s lightning port with a USB-C port, and co… [+1009 chars]
